name: Tomato Basil Pasta
steps: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Sauté garlic in olive oil until fragrant.
Add diced tomatoes and simmer for 8 minutes.
Toss in cooked pasta and chopped basil.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.

name: Chicken Fajitas
steps: Slice chicken and vegetables into strips.
Heat oil in a pan and add chicken.
Sprinkle fajita seasoning and cook until browned.
Add peppers and onion; sauté until tender.

name: Beef Stir-Fry
steps: Slice beef thinly and toss with soy sauce and cornstarch.
Cut broccoli into florets and slice carrot.
Heat oil in a wok and sear beef.
Add vegetables and stir-fry until crisp-tender.
Stir in oyster sauce and serve over rice.

name: Vegetable Curry
steps: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger in oil.
Stir in curry paste and cook 1 minute.
Pour in coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
Add mixed vegetables and cook until tender.
Season with salt and serve with rice.

name: Grilled Salmon with Lemon
steps: Season salmon with salt, pepper, and oil.
Garnish with chopped dill and serve.

name: Classic Omelette
steps: Beat eggs with salt and pepper.
Melt butter in a nonstick pan.
Pour eggs and cook, lifting edges to let uncooked egg flow.
Add cheese and fold the omelette.
Top with chopped chives and serve.

name: Greek Salad
steps: Combine tomatoes, cucumber, onion, olives, and feta.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle oregano.

name: Shrimp Scampi
steps: Sauté garlic in butter and oil until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Pour in white wine and reduce slightly.
Serve over pasta or with crusty bread.

name: Mushroom Risotto
steps: Sauté onion and mushrooms in oil.
Add warm stock ladle by ladle, stirring.
Continue until rice is creamy and al dente.

name: Caprese Sandwich
steps: Slice ciabatta and drizzle with olive oil.
Season with salt and drizzle balsamic.

name: Tacos al Pastor
steps: Marinate sliced pork with achiote paste.
Grill pork and pineapple until charred.
Chop and combine with diced onion and cilantro.
Finish with a squeeze of lime.

name: Avocado Toast
steps: Mash avocado with lemon juice and salt.
Spread on toast and drizzle olive oil.

name: Butternut Squash Soup
steps: Add roasted squash and stock; simmer 10 minutes.
Blend until smooth and stir in cream.

name: BBQ Chicken Drumsticks
steps: Season drumsticks with salt, pepper, and paprika.
Brush with BBQ sauce and bake 10 more minutes.

name: Spinach and Feta Quiche
steps: Whisk eggs, milk, salt, and pepper.
Spread spinach and feta in crust.
Pour custard over and bake 35-40 minutes.

name: Pancakes
steps: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk egg, milk, and melted butter.
Cook pancakes on a hot griddle.

name: Garlic Butter Steak
steps: Season steaks and let sit 20 minutes.
Sear in a hot pan to desired doneness.
Add butter, garlic, and thyme; baste.

name: Chickpea Buddha Bowl
steps: Roast cubed sweet potato until tender.
Sauté kale with olive oil lightly.
Toast chickpeas in pan until crisp.
Whisk tahini with lemon juice and water.
Assemble bowl with avocado and drizzle dressing.

name: Lentil Dal
steps: Rinse lentils until water runs clear.
Add lentils and water; simmer until soft.
Adjust salt and serve with rice.

name: Margherita Pizza
steps: Stretch dough on a floured surface.
Spread sauce and top with mozzarella.
Top with basil and drizzle olive oil.

name: Teriyaki Chicken Rice Bowl
steps: Add teriyaki sauce and simmer until glazed.
Garnish with sesame and green onions.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
steps: Mix in rice and tomato sauce.
Stuff peppers and top with cheese.

name: Falafel Wraps
steps: Blend chickpeas with aromatics and spices.
Serve in pita with veggies and tahini.

name: Baked Ziti
steps: Mix pasta with marinara and ricotta.

name: Turkey Chili
steps: Stir in chili powder and simmer 25 minutes.

name: Garlic Parmesan Wings
steps: Toss wings with oil, salt, and pepper.
Sauté garlic in butter and toss wings.

name: Thai Green Curry
steps: Simmer curry paste in coconut milk.
Season with fish sauce and lime.
Top with basil and serve with rice.

name: Quinoa Salad
steps: Toss with oil and lemon juice.
Season with salt and chill before serving.

name: Pesto Chicken Pasta
steps: Toss pasta with pesto and tomatoes.

name: Sushi Rolls
steps: Cook rice and season with rice vinegar.
Lay nori and spread rice evenly.
Slice and serve with soy sauce.

name: Baked Lemon Chicken
steps: Season chicken with salt, pepper, and rosemary.
Add lemon slices and crushed garlic.

name: Egg Fried Rice
steps: Stir-fry garlic and rice in sesame oil.
Add peas, soy sauce, and eggs.

name: Tom Kha Soup
steps: Simmer stock with lemongrass and galangal.
Add sliced chicken and cook through.
Season with fish sauce and lime.

name: Veggie Quesadillas
steps: Fill tortillas with veggies and cheese.
Cook on a skillet until cheese melts.

name: Shakshuka
steps: Make wells and crack in eggs.
Cover and cook until eggs set.

name: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwiches
steps: Shred and mix with BBQ sauce.
Dress coleslaw with vinegar and salt.

name: Miso Glazed Eggplant
steps: Mix glaze and brush on eggplant.

name: Clam Linguine
steps: Sauté garlic and chili in oil.
Add clams and wine; cover until opened.

name: Roast Chicken with Herbs
steps: Season chicken and stuff with lemon and herbs.
Roast for 60-75 minutes until juices run clear.

name: Veggie Sushi Bowl
steps: Assemble bowl with rice and veggies.
Top with nori and sesame; serve with soy.

name: Ratatouille
steps: Layer vegetables and bake at 180°C for 40 minutes.
Drizzle with olive oil and herbs.

name: Turkey Meatballs
steps: Mix turkey, breadcrumbs, egg, and seasonings.
Form meatballs and place on a baking sheet.

name: Fish Tacos
steps: Season fish with chili powder and salt.
Assemble tacos with slaw and crema.

name: Pho Bo
steps: Simmer bones with aromatics to make broth.
Assemble bowl with noodles and beef.

name: Greek Lemon Potatoes
steps: Toss with oil, lemon, garlic, and oregano.

name: Panzanella Salad
steps: Toss with bread and let sit 15 minutes.

name: Baked Teriyaki Salmon
steps: Marinate salmon in teriyaki for 15 minutes.

name: Cajun Pasta
steps: Simmer garlic and cream; add parmesan.
Toss pasta with sauce and protein.

name: BBQ Tofu Sandwich
steps: Pan-fry until golden and toss with BBQ.

name: Kale Caesar Salad
steps: Massage kale with oil and lemon.

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
steps: Cook until noodles are tender; add parsley.

name: Maple Glazed Carrots
steps: Slice carrots and sauté in butter.
Add maple syrup and cook until glazed.

name: Spicy Ramen
steps: Simmer broth with gochujang and soy.
Add noodles to broth and top with egg.
Finish with onions and sesame oil.

name: Lemon Garlic Shrimp Pasta
steps: Sauté garlic in butter; add shrimp.
Toss pasta with shrimp, lemon juice, and parsley.

name: Bulgogi Beef
steps: Marinate beef with soy, sugar, garlic, and sesame.
Sear quickly in a hot pan.
Top with green onions and serve with rice.

name: Sweet Potato Tacos
steps: Roast cubed sweet potatoes with spices.
Warm tortillas and fill with potatoes and beans.
Top with avocado, crema, cilantro, and lime.

name: Baked Mac and Cheese
steps: Make cheese sauce with roux and milk.
Mix pasta with sauce and top with breadcrumbs.

name: Burrito Bowl
steps: Cook rice and season with lime.

name: Coconut Curry Shrimp
steps: Add curry paste and coconut milk.
Simmer shrimp until cooked; season with fish sauce and lime.

name: Stuffed Portobello Mushrooms
steps: Fill mushrooms and bake at 190°C for 20 minutes.

name: Mango Salsa Chicken
steps: Mix diced mango, onion, cilantro, lime, and chili.

name: Chicken Satay with Peanut Sauce
steps: Make peanut sauce and serve alongside.

name: Hummus Bowl
steps: Top with chopped vegetables and feta.
Drizzle olive oil and serve with pita.

name: Cuban Mojo Pork
steps: Shred and serve with rice and beans.

name: Bruschetta
steps: Mix diced tomatoes with garlic, basil, oil, and vinegar.

name: Chili Lime Grilled Corn
steps: Brush with butter mixed with chili and lime.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Brown beef and add tomato sauce.
Simmer 20 minutes and serve over pasta.

name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
steps: Toss chicken and romaine with dressing.

name: Caramelized Onion Tart
steps: Top pastry with onions and goat cheese.

name: Lemon Ricotta Pancakes
steps: Whisk wet ingredients with ricotta and zest.

name: Turkey Lettuce Wraps
steps: Brown turkey with garlic and ginger.
Stir in sauces and chopped chestnuts.

name: Penne Arrabbiata
steps: Sauté garlic and chili in oil.
Add sauce and toss with pasta.

name: Chicken Piccata
steps: Dredge chicken in flour and sear.
Make sauce with butter, lemon, capers, and stock.
Return chicken to sauce and simmer.

name: BBQ Ribs
steps: Slow bake with apple juice until tender.
Brush with BBQ and broil briefly.

name: Sesame Chicken
steps: Coat chicken in cornstarch and fry.

name: Vegetable Lasagna
steps: Layer noodles with cheeses, vegetables, and sauce.

name: Garlic Lemon Roasted Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken with garlic, lemon, and oil.
Roast at 200°C until browned and cooked.

name: Vietnamese Spring Rolls
steps: Soften rice paper in warm water.
Fill with shrimp, noodles, and herbs.
Roll tightly and serve with sauce.

name: Chorizo and Potato Tacos
steps: Combine and serve in tortillas with toppings.

name: Pork Fried Rice
steps: Stir-fry pork, then add rice and vegetables.
Season and mix in eggs; garnish with onions.

name: Chicken Tortilla Soup
steps: Sauté aromatics and add tomatoes and stock.
Top with tortilla strips and avocado.

name: Pork Carnitas
steps: Slow-cook pork with seasonings until tender.
Shred and crisp in a pan.

name: Spicy Tuna Pasta
steps: Sauté garlic and chili; add tuna and sauce.

name: Creamy Mushroom Chicken
steps: Add cream and thyme; return chicken and simmer.

name: Roasted Beet Salad
steps: Toss arugula with oil and vinegar.
Top with beets, cheese, and walnuts.

name: Chicken Alfredo
steps: Make Alfredo sauce and toss with pasta and chicken.

name: Spicy Black Bean Tacos
steps: Sauté onion and garlic; add beans and chili powder.

name: Cauliflower Fried Rice
steps: Add soy sauce and eggs; finish with onions.

name: Honey Garlic Glazed Salmon
steps: Add honey, garlic, and soy; reduce to glaze.

name: Baked Falafel
steps: Blend ingredients to a coarse paste.
Form balls and brush with oil.

name: Pulled Chicken Sandwich
steps: Serve in buns with slaw and pickles.

name: Spinach Artichoke Pasta
steps: Stir in cream cheese and parmesan; toss pasta.

name: Mexican Street Corn Salad
steps: Mix with mayo, lime, chili, and cheese.

name: Sesame Soba Stir-Fry
steps: Stir-fry vegetables with garlic and ginger.

name: Roasted Chicken Thighs with Veggies
steps: Toss vegetables with oil and rosemary.
Season chicken and place on top.

name: Baked Brie with Honey
steps: Top with thyme and walnuts; serve.

name: Thai Basil Chicken
steps: Add chicken and sauces; cook through.
Stir in basil and serve over rice.

name: Roasted Garlic Mashed Potatoes
steps: Mash with garlic, butter, and milk.

name: Veggie Burritos
steps: Fill with rice, beans, corn, and cheese.

name: Chicken Enchiladas
steps: Fill tortillas with chicken and onion.
Place in dish, cover with sauce and cheese.

name: Garlic Herb Roasted Salmon
steps: Rub salmon with garlic, herbs, and oil.

name: Kimchi Fried Rice
steps: Add sauces and fry egg on top.

name: Garlic Lemon Asparagus
steps: Toss asparagus with oil and garlic.

name: BBQ Jackfruit Sandwich
steps: Shred jackfruit and simmer in BBQ sauce.
Toast buns and assemble with slaw.

name: Chicken Pesto Flatbread
steps: Top with chicken, cheese, and tomatoes.

name: Mexican Rice
steps: Sauté rice with onion and garlic.
Add sauce and broth; simmer until tender.

name: Teriyaki Tofu Stir-Fry
steps: Pour teriyaki sauce and toss; garnish with onions.

name: Minestrone Soup
steps: Add stock, tomatoes, beans, and simmer.
Add pasta and cook until tender.

name: Pork Schnitzel
steps: Dredge in flour, egg, and breadcrumbs.
Pan-fry until golden; serve with lemon.

name: Cilantro Lime Rice
steps: Cook rice with butter and salt.
Stir in lime zest, juice, and cilantro.

name: Spinach Feta Stuffed Chicken
steps: Sauté spinach and garlic; mix with feta.
Sear and bake until cooked through.

name: Shrimp Fried Rice
steps: Add rice and sauces; mix in eggs.

name: Tomato Basil Bruschetta Pasta
steps: Sauté tomatoes and garlic; add balsamic.
Toss with pasta and basil; top with parmesan.

name: Chicken and Broccoli Stir-Fry
steps: Marinate chicken with sauces and cornstarch.

name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts
steps: Halve sprouts and toss with oil and seasoning.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate chicken and grill or sear.
Simmer sauce with tomato and cream.
Add chicken and serve with rice.

name: Greek Orzo Salad
steps: Mix with chopped vegetables and feta.

name: Pork Ramen
steps: Assemble bowl with noodles, pork, and toppings.

name: Garlic Butter Green Beans
steps: Season and add lemon and almonds.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
steps: Top with chicken, onion, and cheese.
Bake until crust is golden; garnish with cilantro.

name: Chicken and Rice Casserole
steps: Combine rice, stock, and vegetables in a dish.
Season chicken and place on top.

name: Roasted Tomato Bruschetta
steps: Mix with basil, oil, and balsamic.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Mix in egg and dry ingredients.
Fold in chocolate chips and bake at 180°C for 10-12 minutes.
